snippet: A police officer shot and killed an armed man in St. Louis on Wednesday, the authorities said.
abstract: Police officer shoots and kills armed man in St Louis after he flees pedestrian check and fires at officer.
lead_paragraph: A police officer shot and killed an armed man in St. Louis on Wednesday, the authorities said.

headline.main: Missouri: St. Louis Officer Kills Armed Man
headline.print_headline: St. Louis Officer Kills Armed Man
